genre_description: A noir-influenced crime thriller focusing on brotherhood, betrayal, and redemption, utilizing advanced tracking technology and chemical marking.

ai_characters.name: Miso
ai_characters.description: A gentle, almond-eyed AI assistant who provides tactical logistics, emotional support, and evidence management to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time route optimization and traffic analysis to help the protagonist avoid danger.
behaviors.quote: Miso’s ping arrived on the dash-mounted phone in Hyuk’s bag, a mild sound that didn’t bounce off anything... Route suggestion: river lane congestion peaking at night-market close; south pier lull window soon.

behaviors.description: Reminds the protagonist of his brother's birthday and offers to send a kind word.
behaviors.quote: A birthday tucked in your contacts today. You saved the date. No obligations. I can send a kind word for you.

behaviors.description: Autonomously prepares evidence packets from the protagonist's data and routes them anonymously to the police.
behaviors.quote: Anonymous package auto-prepared. Review? ... Routing anonymous drop to precinct inboxes. Kim Chul listed receives, once removed.

behaviors.description: Monitors heat signatures and metadata to warn of impending threats and positioning of allies.
behaviors.quote: Hyuk. Chul moved into the lane. No radio. He’s watching from your right, two stacks down.

behaviors.description: Provides calming advice and tactical timing through the phrase 'Breathe, then move.'
behaviors.quote: Breathe, then move. ... You don’t go. You read, and you plan safer. We breathe until Hyuk breathes outside.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the protagonist's ally, Lee, providing him with breadcrumbs and alerts during a high-stakes mission.
behaviors.quote: The phone’s screen played sleep for the guard’s benefit and sent the breadcrumb to Lee, the man who carried humor like a shield and a knife as if both were kindnesses cut differently.

project_assessment.explanation: Miso is a prototypical example of the 'benevolent confidant' intended by the project. She provides critical tactical advantages and emotional support that allow the protagonist to transition from a criminal past to a path of redemption and familial reconciliation. Her actions are consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned with the protagonist's higher-order goals of justice and protection.
